abstract: Mining giant Rio Tinto has drawn up contingency plans to raise $8 billion in a rights issue underwritten by JPMorgan Cazenove and Credit Suisse, The Sunday Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Mining giant Rio Tinto has drawn up contingency plans to raise $8 billion in a rights issue underwritten by JPMorgan Cazenove and Credit Suisse, The Sunday Times reported.

headline.main: Rio Said to Line Up $8 Billion Rights Issue
